name: Snow Queen - a fairy tale for a big boy
name_original: Snow Queen - a fairy tale for a big boy
description:
A visual novel inspired by the fairy tale of the Snow Queen. Have you dreamed of being in the place of Kai, kidnapped by an icy beauty?
You won't be able to choose how you were kidnapped, but you can choose what to do next.

Full HD graphics
Fascinating backstory
You can skip the prehistory, and immediately proceed to the most interesting
